FuncDef: This command assigns a license level upgrade to the card or XMA. There can be multiple upgrades applied to a card or XMA. The first upgrade must use index 1 and then next index 2 and so on. Also, when removing upgrades, the largest index must be removed first and then the next largest removed and so on.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the order of the upgrade. Values-1 to 6.
Specifies the upgrade name to be applied, up to 32 characters.
